name: src/Tape.js
Tape
description:
Class that wraps a callable with a tape.
Do not use directly. Use {@link fromCallable} instead.

name: constructor
description: The constructor. Stores the callable that yields values to put on the tape.

name: callable
description: The callable yielding values to put on the tape.

name: buffer
description: Buffer used to implement {@link Tape#unread}.

name: eof
description: The eof symbol.

name: read
description:
Returns the next token on the tape or {@link Tape#eof}
if the tape has been exhausted.

unknown.tagValue: {Object} The next token on the tape or {@link Tape#eof}.

return.description: The next token on the tape or {@link Tape#eof}.

name: unread
description:
Puts a token back on the tape. If {@link Tape#read} is
used just after, this token will be returned.

params.name: token
params.description: The token to put back on the tape.

name: skip
description: Skips the next token on the tape.

name: skipMany
description: Skip the next `n` tokens on the tape.

params.name: n
params.description: The number of tokens to skip.

name: [Symbol.asyncIterator]
description: Returns an async iterator on the tokens of the tape.
examples:
fromString('abc');
for await ( const token of tape ) console.log(token) ;

unknown.tagValue: {AsyncIterator} Iterator on the tokens of the tape.

return.description: Iterator on the tokens of the tape.

name: [Symbol.iterator]
description: Explicitely throws when trying to access iterator symbol.

name: src/asyncIterableChain.js
asyncIterableChain
description: Utility function to chain an async iterable of async iterables.

unknown.tagValue: {AsyncIterable} The chain of the input iterables.

return.description: The chain of the input iterables.

name: src/asyncIterableMap.js
asyncIterableMap
description: Utility function to apply a sync callable to each item of an async iterable.

name: src/asyncIterableToArray.js
asyncIterableToArray
description: Spreads an asynchronous iterable inside a new array.

unknown.tagValue: {Array} A new array filled with the elements of the input iterable.

return.description: A new array filled with the elements of the input iterable.

name: src/chain.js
chain
description: Converts a tape of tapes of tokens to a tape of tokens.

params.name: tape
params.description: The tape of tapes of tokens to read from.

name: src/eof.js
src/exhaust.js
exhaust
description: Exhausts a tape.

name: src/fromArray.js
src/fromAsyncIterable.js
fromAsyncIterable
description: Converts an asynchronous iterable to a tape.

name: src/fromCallable.js
fromCallable
description: Converts a callable to a tape.

name: src/fromIterable.js
fromIterable
description: Converts an iterable to a tape.

name: src/fromIterator.js
fromIterator
description: Converts an iterator to a tape.

name: src/fromReadStream.js
_fromReadStream
description: Converts a ReadStream object to an async iterable of tokens.

name: fromReadStream
description: Converts a ReadStream object to a tape.

name: src/fromString.js
src/ignore.js
ignore
description: Filters a tape by ignoring a given set of tokens.

unknown.tagValue: {Tape} The input tape but with some tokens ignored.

return.description: The input tape but with some tokens ignored.

name: src/index.js
src/map.js
map
description: Applies a callable to each token of a tape.

name: src/skip.js
skip
description:
Outputs the next token of a tape that is not contained in a given toskip
set.

name: src/split.js
split
description:
Splits the input tape into a tape of tapes according to some set of
separators. See {@link _split} for the actual implementation.

name: _split
description: Same as {@link split}, but returns an iterable rather than a tape.

name: src/toArray.js
toArray
description: Converts a tape to an array.

name: src/toAsyncCallable.js
toAsyncCallable
description: Converts a tape to a callable.

name: src/toAsyncIterable.js
toAsyncIterable
description: Converts a tape to an asynchronous iterable.

name: src/toAsyncIterator.js
toAsyncIterator
description: Converts a tape to an async iterator.

name: src/toString.js
toString
description: Converts a tape to a string.

content:
:vhs:
[@async-abstraction/tape](https://async-abstraction.github.io/tape)
==

Tape library for JavaScript. Served with asynchronous goodness.
See [docs](https://async-abstraction.github.io/tape/index.html).

> :warning: The code requires `regeneratorRuntime` to be defined, for instance by importing
> [regenerator-runtime/runtime](https://www.npmjs.com/package/regenerator-runtime).

```js
import { fromReadStream } from '@async-abstraction/tape' ;
const stdin = fs.createReadStream( '/dev/stdin' , { encoding : 'utf8'} ) ;
const tape = fromReadStream( stdin ) ;
for await ( const character of tape ) ... ;
```

name: ./README.md
package.json
./doc/manual/overview.md
content: # Overview

name: ./doc/manual/installation.md
content:
# Installation

Can be managed using
[yarn](https://yarnpkg.com/en/docs),
[npm](https://docs.npmjs.com),
or [jspm](https://jspm.org/docs).


### yarn
```terminal
yarn add @async-abstraction/tape
```

### npm
```terminal
npm install @async-abstraction/tape --save
```

### jspm
```terminal
jspm install npm:@async-abstraction/tape
```
